AgentGraph-Input.title: AgentGraph
AgentGraph-Input.description:
Complete agent workflow graph.

This is the unified internal representation (IR) that all importers
convert to. It captures the full structure of an agent's conversation
flow including nodes, transitions, and metadata.

AgentGraph-Output.title: AgentGraph
AgentGraph-Output.description:
Complete agent workflow graph.

This is the unified internal representation (IR) that all importers
convert to. It captures the full structure of an agent's conversation
flow including nodes, transitions, and metadata.

AgentNode-Input.title: AgentNode
AgentNode-Input.description:
Single node (state) in the agent workflow graph.

Each node represents a distinct conversational state with its own
system instructions, available tools, and possible transitions.

AgentNode-Output.title: AgentNode
AgentNode-Output.description:
Single node (state) in the agent workflow graph.

Each node represents a distinct conversational state with its own
system instructions, available tools, and possible transitions.

ConfigurePlatformRequest.title: ConfigurePlatformRequest
ConfigurePlatformRequest.description: Request to configure a platform API key.

CreateAgentRequest.title: CreateAgentRequest
CreateAgentRequest.description: Request to create an agent from config or file path.

CreateTestCaseRequest.title: CreateTestCaseRequest
CreateTestCaseRequest.description: Request to create a test case.

ExportFormatInfo.title: ExportFormatInfo
ExportFormatInfo.description: Export format information for API response.

ExportRequest.title: ExportRequest
ExportRequest.description: Request to export an agent graph.

ExportToPlatformRequest.title: ExportToPlatformRequest
ExportToPlatformRequest.description: Request to export an agent to a platform.

ExportToPlatformResponse.title: ExportToPlatformResponse
ExportToPlatformResponse.description: Response from exporting an agent to a platform.

GlobalMetric.title: GlobalMetric
GlobalMetric.description:
A metric that runs on all tests for an agent.

Global metrics are evaluated against every test transcript,
useful for compliance checks that should always pass.

ImportRequest.title: ImportRequest
ImportRequest.description: Request to import an agent config.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Single message in a conversation transcript.

MetricResult.title: MetricResult
MetricResult.description: Evaluation result for a single metric criterion.

RemoteAgentInfo.title: RemoteAgentInfo
RemoteAgentInfo.description: Information about a remote agent on a platform.

RunOptions.title: RunOptions
RunOptions.description:
Options for test execution.

LLM model strings use LiteLLM format: "provider/model"
Examples: "openai/gpt-4o-mini", "anthropic/claude-3-haiku-20240307"

flow_judge.title: Flow Judge
flow_judge.description: Run flow judge to validate transitions

streaming.title: Streaming
streaming.description: Stream tokens as they are generated

RunTestRequest.title: RunTestRequest
RunTestRequest.description: Request to run a single test.

env.title: Env
env.description: Environment variables to set (e.g., API keys for LLM providers)

StartRunRequest.title: StartRunRequest
StartRunRequest.description: Request to start a test run.

TestCase.title: TestCase
TestCase.description:
Single test case definition.

Two test types are supported:

1. LLM tests (type="llm"): Use an LLM judge to evaluate semantic metrics.
   {
       "name": "Billing inquiry",
       "user_prompt": "Ask about a charge on your bill...",
       "metrics": ["Agent was helpful and professional"],
       "type": "llm"
   }

2. Rule tests (type="rule"): Use deterministic pattern matching.
   {
       "name": "Greeting check",
       "user_prompt": "Say hello",
       "includes": ["welcome", "help"],
       "excludes": ["goodbye"],
       "patterns": ["REF-[A-Z0-9]+"],
       "type": "rule"
   }

Legacy type values "simulation" and "unit" are mapped to "llm" and "rule".

TestResult.title: TestResult
TestResult.description: Result of running a single test case.

TestRun.title: TestRun
TestRun.description: Aggregated results from multiple test cases.

ToolCall.title: ToolCall
ToolCall.description: Record of a tool invocation during conversation.

ToolDefinition.title: ToolDefinition
ToolDefinition.description: Definition of a tool/function available to the agent.

Transition.title: Transition
Transition.description: Edge from one node to another in the agent graph.

TransitionCondition.title: TransitionCondition
TransitionCondition.description:
Condition that triggers a transition between nodes.

Supports multiple condition types:
- llm_prompt: LLM evaluates a natural language condition
- equation: Deterministic evaluation of a formula (e.g., {{age}} > 18)
- tool_call: Transition triggered by specific tool invocation
- always: Unconditional transition

UpdateMetricsConfigRequest.title: UpdateMetricsConfigRequest
UpdateMetricsConfigRequest.description: Request to update an agent's metrics configuration.
